text: Decrease of NF-kappaB activity in tumor tissue of <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice .

A , The DNA binding activity of NF-kappaB was determined in the nuclear extracts of the <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice and <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + / + mice tumor tissues by EMSA described in material and methods .

B , Expression of <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation in nuclear extracts ( NE ) , and IkappaB and IkappaB phosphorylation in the cytosol ( CE ) determined by Western blotting .

C , Immunolfluorescence analysis of <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> confirmed that the intensities of nuclear staining for <extra_id_0> p50 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were decreased in the tumor tissues of <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - mice .
Data are means +/- S.D . of four experimental animals .
* indicates significant difference from <extra_id_0> CCR5 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + / + mice ( p < 0.05 ) .
